description:
"I`ll protect you!" The Amatsumara responds to Misa`s powerful resolve and creativity, creating colorful beads that fall from the sky like rain. Rito, Mari, and Kotoko join Misa in their final showdown against Ebifurya, and they use their creativity to devise a method to fight back. In their fantasy world they`re able to mature just a little and act decisively.
Source: crunchyroll
